title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-6.2 - Documentation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-6.2 - Documentation

State Regulations
SSP recipients must respond to requests for
information and/or documentation made by the Office within 10 days from the
date of the request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-6.2

Adopted by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 10/1/2014. Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
